biotools.summary: vcfgl is a lightweight command-line program for simulating VCF/BCF and gVCF files. It allows you to simulate sequencing data with various parameters, such as read depth, base-calling error rates, quality score errors, and genotype likelihood models.

bioschemas.name: vcfgl
bioschemas.summary: vcfgl is a lightweight command-line program for simulating VCF/BCF and gVCF files. It allows you to simulate sequencing data with various parameters, such as read depth, base-calling error rates, quality score errors, and genotype likelihood models.
